48 #define MIN(a, b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
49 
50 #define MAX(a, b) ((a) < (b) ? (b) : (a))

64 #define CONCAT_2(p1, p2) CONCAT_2_(p1, p2)
65 
66 #define CONCAT_2_(p1, p2) p1##p2
67

82 
83 #define CONCAT_3_(p1, p2, p3) p1##p2##p3

86 #define ARRAY_SIZE(arr) (sizeof(arr) / sizeof((arr)[0]))

96 #define ROUNDED_DIV(A, B) (((A) + ((B) / 2)) / (B))

106 #define CEIL_DIV(A, B) \
107  (((A) + (B) - 1) / (B))

115 #define IS_POWER_OF_TWO(A) ( ((A) != 0) && ((((A) - 1) & (A)) == 0) )
